name: Adult baby Babysitter
description:
Join Melisa as she goes on a short babysitting job. This was a spare time project using what I could from a humble bundle collection of rpg maker titles and assets.

You could probably beat the game in under ten moments if you know what you're doing, its really just a proof of concept at this point, and hopeful I can use that concept more.

If you want to see more/ help me get some made for purpose assets drop me some cash at Paypal.me/sappyolhusky and tell me any good abdl pixel artists.
